rows.label: qev035604_MSG0001
rows.name: Tsk. Of all people to beat unconscious...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0002
rows.name:
This is Lebora. Tree Clan whiner.
He woke up. Swore to chase us from New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0003
rows.name:
Shameful Prone! You sold your souls to Ganglion!
You have no right to mock me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0004
rows.name:
Soon my injuries heal. Then I take vengeance.
Vengeance for clansmen killed by your kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ugh. What nuisance. Should I just kill him?
Killing seems like simplest solution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0006
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0007
rows.name: Shrug and say it's the only thing you can think of.

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0008
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0009
rows.name:
Tell Slovity that would make her
no better than the Ganglion.

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0012
rows.name:
I am not surprised. You captured me.
I am prepared for death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0013
rows.name:
Kill me if you want.
But pride of Tree Clan will never die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0014
rows.name:
Are you dense, Earth alien? Why would I do that?
We left Ganglion to AVOID that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0015
rows.name:
Also, I feel bad for beating you unconscious, Lebora.
Er...apologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0016
rows.name:
I wore cursed gear. It took over my body.
...I don't want to talk about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0019
rows.name: It was joke! I am tired to death of killing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0020
rows.name:
From now on, all my fights are face-to-face.
Fair and square.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0021
rows.name:
Are you dissatisfied, Lebora Jargi?
Then hit me all you like. I will not fight back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0022
rows.name:
I did not mean to beat you senseless. I wore cursed
gear sold by Earth alien. It took control of my body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0025
rows.name:
You think I believe such ridiculous lies?
Your kind loves cowardly tricks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0026
rows.name: Oh no! Captain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0027
rows.name:
What is it, Trigo?
I am trying to calm Lebora down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0028
rows.name:
Rest of team went out to stop you.
They all bought gear from same Earth alien![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0029
rows.name:
I thought it strange none returned to New LA.
But you are saying—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0030
rows.name:
Gear they bought has probably taken control
over them! Leads them to Megisia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0031
rows.name: Ha! Cowardly lies will not fool—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0032
rows.name: Silence! My men's lives may be in danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0033
rows.name: Convince Lebora

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0034
rows.name: Side with Slovity and try to quiet Lebora.

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0035
rows.name: Disagree with Slovity

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0036
rows.name:
Tell Slovity that resolving things with
Lebora has to be her first priority.

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0039
rows.name: This is not... I will not believe it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0040
rows.name:
Believe. Disbelieve. That is your decision.
Just make sure that you shut up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0043
rows.name: But there is no time...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0044
rows.name:
...You are right. His people were killed by Ganglion.
By...us. He knows how I feel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0045
rows.name: I will make this right, Lebora. This I swear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0046
rows.name:
But this is important. May I please speak with the
Earth alien for moment?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0047
rows.name: Talk if you must. ...Since you asked nicely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0050
rows.name:
When I wore gear, [ST:playername ],
I heard voice in my head. Over and over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0051
rows.name:
It bade me to come to Milligan supply base in Oblivia.
Bade me to serve woman called Megisia.
Bade me to fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0052
rows.name:
I am strong. I fought voice. But my men will not.
I fear they march toward Oblivia now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0053
rows.name:
You must go there in my stead. Kill this Megisia.
Will you do this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0054
rows.name: Bring my men home if possible. Try not to kill them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0057
rows.name:
Voice from gear was overwhelming.
Any longer, and I would have been slave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0058
rows.name:
My men believed in me. Followed me from Ganglion.
Do not let them be slaves again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0059
rows.name: Kill Megisia. Spare my men if you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0062
rows.name: You crushed Megisia! My men live! Amazing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0063
rows.name: I will never forget what you have done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0064
rows.name:
We will have vengeance on Ganglion hundred times
over![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0065
rows.name:
Trigo! Give [ST:playername ] money we stole
from Ganglion. All of it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0066
rows.name: For captain and team's lives? It is small price to pay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0070
rows.name: Your men are safe? I am glad for you, Slovity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0071
rows.name: Though we killed your clansmen in past?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0072
rows.name:
You are good man. I hope we spar again soon.
This time without gear in way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0073
rows.name:
I would like this! My fists will prove that Tree Clan
warriors always stand their ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0076
rows.name:
You left Ganglion. But you are not forgiven.
Not by me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0077
rows.name: Because you are stubborn Tree Clan fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0078
rows.name: And you are embarrassment to Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0079
rows.name: Farewell. May we never meet again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0085
rows.name:
My men are back. ...Most of them.
I know there was no avoiding it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0086
rows.name: Without you, entire team would be gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0087
rows.name: Trigo, give Earth alien what I told you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0088
rows.name:
Take this. As thanks for saving captain.
And...most of team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0092
rows.name: You lost men? That is shame. I am sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0093
rows.name:
We knew danger when we deserted.
My men feared not death. That is war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0094
rows.name: ...That is war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0095
rows.name:
It is strange to speak with you thus.
You do not seem like bad sort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0096
rows.name:
Nor you. For we share common enemy.
Let us fight it together from here on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0099
rows.name:
You left Ganglion. But you are not forgiven.
Not by me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0100
rows.name: I am in no mood to bandy words with you, Lebora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0101
rows.name: You are embarrassment to Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035604_MSG0102
rows.name: Farewell. May we never meet again.[ST:wait ]
